properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 13 at 4:58PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
At 458 PM EST, thunderstorms were located along a line extending from
near Port Royal Sound to near Wassaw Sound Buoy, moving northeast at
45 knots.

HAZARD...Winds up to 30 knots.

IMPACT...Expect briefly stronger winds and suddenly higher waves.
Put on a personal flotation device.

Marine locations impacted through 545 PM EST include:
Port Royal Sound...               Whitewater Reef...
Beaufort 45 Feet Reef...          Saint Helena Sound...
Hunting Island Reef...            Betsy Ross Reef...
Fripp Island Reef...              Fish America...
Lowcountry Anglers...             Pelican Bank...
Edisto Sixty Reef...              Kiawah Reef...
Hilton Head Reef...               Savannah Buoy...
N. Edisto Nearshore Reef...       Gaskin Banks...
General Gordon...                 Fripp Island Wreck...
Gaskins Bank Wreck...             Fripp Inlet Buoy...
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots, locally higher
waves, lightning strikes, and poor visibility in heavy rain. Boaters
should seek safe harbor immediately until these storms pass.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS THUNDERSTORMS IMPACTING THE COASTAL WATERS
